title: Reproductive technology: facts and issues
creator_credit: Jonathan Pearl, Neil Barrett and Environment Audio Visuals
brief_description: This video is designed for students in years 10-12. Part one looks at recent technological advances in the field of reproduction and Part two raises some of the legal and ethical issues involved in such technology.
creator_credit_for_label: Jonathan Pearl, Neil Barrett and Environment Audio Visuals
